plot: To help his brother achieve his goals as a student of classical music, a man sacrifices his own ambitions of a career as a serious musician and settles for being a drummer in a night club's band. As his popularity increases and his band gains a degree of fame, the drummer whom he replaced becomes determined to sabatoge the groups success.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Pokpungui sanai
plot_es: To help his brother achieve his goals as a student of classical music, a man sacrifices his own ambitions of a career as a serious musician and settles for being a drummer in a night club's band. As his popularity increases and his band gains a degree of fame, the drummer whom he replaced becomes determined to sabatoge the groups success.   Written by  Anonymous
